articles.title: NBA star Giannis Antetokounmpo joins Kalshi as an investor
articles.description: Antetokounmpo is the first NBA player to directly invest in Kalshi.
articles.author: Anthony Ha

articles.title: New York lawmakers propose a three-year pause on new data centers
articles.description: Although the bill’s prospects are uncertain, New York is at least the sixth state to consider pausing construction of new data centers.
articles.author: Anthony Ha

articles.title: Benchmark raises $225M in special funds to double down on Cerebras
articles.description: Benchmark Capital has been an investor in the Nvidia rival since 2016.
articles.author: Marina Temkin

articles.title: An AI startup founder says he’s planning a ‘March for Billionaires’ in protest of California’s wealth tax
articles.description: The organizer of the event swears it's not a joke.
articles.author: Lucas Ropek

articles.title: ‘Industry’ season 4 captures tech fraud better than any show on TV right now
articles.description: This latest season of the TV show Industry takes a look at the world of money and power through the eyes of a fintech baron.
articles.author: Dominic-Madori Davis
